<div class="doc-test-section">

<h3 class="doctest-section-pyname>Creating a Log Header</h3>

Default log header have timestamp and follow this pattern:

>>> from loggrok.log import LogHeader
>>> from loggrok.parse import LOG_PATTERN_DEFAULT
>>> header = '2005-11-22 12:00:00,346 DEBUG '
>>> int(LOG_PATTERN_DEFAULT.match(header) is not None)
1


Creating a log header:

>>> log_header = LogHeader(header)
>>> print log_header.timestamp
2005-11-22 12:00:00,346
>>> print log_header.level
DEBUG

</div>
